# St Paul's Cray (ward)

'''St Paul's Cray''' is an electoral ward in the London Borough of Bromley. The ward was first used in the 2022 elections and elects three councillors to Bromley London Borough Council.
Geography
The ward is named after the suburb of St Paul's Cray.
